name: The Profaned Temple
description: A once-sacred temple now twisted by dark forces. Holy symbols lie corrupted, and what was once a place of salvation now serves as a beacon of corruption. The very walls seem to pulse with malevolent energy.

templates.name: Dark Corridor
templates.description: A narrow passage lined with corrupted symbols

templates.name: Desecrated Temple Gates
templates.description: Once-holy gates now twisted by dark energies, their sacred symbols corrupted

templates.name: Corrupted Chapel
templates.description: A chapel where holy symbols have been perverted into symbols of darkness

templates.name: Defiled Confessional
templates.description: A small chamber where sins are celebrated rather than absolved

templates.name: Dark Altar Chamber
templates.description: The temple's main altar, now a focal point of corruption
